headline: Transportation Stocks Rally After Trump's Tariffs Ruled Illegal
summary: Shares in trucking firms, rail operators, logistics giants and airlines rallied Friday after the Supreme Court ruled that many of President Trump's signature tariffs are illegal.    The Dow Jones Transportation Average jumped as much as 1.
